description.narrative: To improve the quality and efficiency of water, wastewater, and solid waste services in selected cities in Ukraine. This will be achieved through rehabilitation and reconstruction of water supply, sanitation and solid waste infrastructure in about ten cities. The project will also support improvements in sustainable service delivery through activities to be implemented under Component 2.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
